title: Bug 11280[View Mgmt] Switching perspectives loses view maximized state
description: This bug report pertains to the issue of view maximization not being retained when switching between perspectives in the software.
OB: Upon switching perspectives, the CVS repository view is no longer maximized, which is not the expected behavior. A maximized view should remain maximized.
EB: The expected behavior is that the CVS repository view, when maximized, should stay maximized even after switching between perspectives.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, please follow these steps:
1. Open the CVS repository view in the Java perspective.
2. Maximize the view by double-clicking the title bar.
3. Switch to the resource perspective.
4. Return to the Java perspective.
